description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: There is a command injection vulnerability in the TRENDnet TEW-827DRU router with firmware version 2.10B01. An attacker can inject commands into the post request parameters usapps.config.smb_admin_name in the apply.cgi interface, thereby gaining root shell privileges.

Existe una vulnerabilidad de inyección de comandos en el router TRENDnet TEW-827DRU con la versión de firmware 2.10B01. Un atacante puede inyectar comandos en los parámetros de solicitud posterior usapps.config.smb_admin_name en la interfaz apply.cgi, obteniendo así privilegios de root en el shell.
